item.description:
FOR THE SECOND YEAR WE ARE COLLECTING TOYS FOR KIDS FOR KIDS THAT BELONG TO FAMILIES WHO ARE IN NEED. WE RENTED THE HALL, GOT SANTA AND HIS ELVES TO COME, TALKED SNOW WHITE INTO MAKING THE TRIP TO TELL STORIES AND PLAY GAMES WITH THE CHILDREN. WE WILL HAVE A BUFFET DINNER, LIVE CHRISTMAS MUSIC AND LOTS OF KIDS PLAYING. BRING YOUR NIECES NEPHEWS SISTERS KIDS WHATEVER OR JUST STOP BY FOR A DRINK AND TO DELIVER A PRESENT TO HELP SANTA DISTRIBUTE IN FRONT OF YOU TO A NEEDY CHILD.

WHETHER YOU STAY FOR A MINUTE TO DROP OFF A GIFT OR SPEND THE WHOLE NIGHT AND PARTICIPATE IN EVERY ACTIVITY YOU WILL MOST CERTAINLY CATCH THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT AND RICH REWARD OF MAKING THE SEASON BRIGHTER FOR EACH CHILD THAT ATTENDS
item.name: HOLIDAY FUN THAT IS RICH IN REWARD
